name: Ice Fire Egg
text:
Can be used during your next turn after a Trap Card you controlled was destroyed.
During this turn, once only, when you Xyz Summon a WATER Winged Beast-Type Xyz Monster, you can also Xyz Summon it by using 1 WATER Xyz Monster with 1 Rank lower than that monster.
This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
